While sexual harassment allegations are pouring out from all corners in the wake of #MeToo movement, which has finally arrived in India, what happened yesterday left people somewhat startled.
Female comedian Kaneez Surka took to Twitter to reveal that she was “forcefully kissed” by her fellow comedian Aditi Mittal, in front the audience during the show. She accused that she put her tongue inside her mouth. All this happened without her consent, she said.
Also Read: In A First, A Woman Comedian Has Been Accused Of Sexually Harassing Another Woman Comedian
As soon as Kaneez Surka had posted this on Twitter, Aditi Mittal retweeted her tweet. Hours later, she issued an apology, accepted that she gave her a peck on the lips without consent. Also, she clarified that it was meant as a joke and that she didn’t use her tongue to kiss.
